snippet: The possibility that the detainee, a Sudanese man, may not be released from the Guantánamo Bay prison threatens to undermine the ability of prosecutors to persuade other detainees to plead guilty.
abstract: Possibility that Guantanamo detainee Noor Uthman Muhammaed may not be released as promised under 2011 plea deal threatens to undermine the ability of prosecutors to persuade other detainees to plead guilty.
lead_paragraph: The possibility that the detainee, a Sudanese man, may not be released from the Guantánamo Bay prison threatens to undermine the ability of prosecutors to persuade other detainees to plead guilty.

headline.seo: Detainee’s Release in Doubt, Lawyers Seek Order by Judge
headline.main: Lawyers Press Pentagon to Abide by Detainee Deal
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Press Pentagon To Abide by Detainee Deal
